question: Can ADP Technology be fixed in Petrol and Diesel Vehicles?

question: Why are there so many stages for increase in Mileage?
answer: There are a lot of hydro carbon deposits in the engine which first get cleaned and flushed out into the engine oil. As the carbon deposits flush out, mileage enhances gradually.
For bikes after 500 kms it is mandatory to change the engine oil.
For cars after 1000 kms it is mandatory to change the engine oil.
This is a one-time activity only.
Example: If you replace engine oil every 2000 kms, after installation you replace every 4000 kms.

question: What pre-checks do I have to keep in mind before and after installing NEOPLATRON MILEAGE KITS?
answer: Battery should be in good condition.
Spark plugs and wires should be good.
Airfilter rubber boot should not be brittle.
Battery should be in general good condition.
Air screw should not be jammed.
Engine oil change after first 500 kms (bikes) / 1000 kms (cars).
After that, oil change every 4000–6000 kms.
Plasma liquid refill every 10000 kms (50–150 ml).
Using any other liquid voids warranty.
